MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML2 postcode area of Wishaw. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 2:50AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault investigations and repairs and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:33am on 12 November 2020
